2082530.name: Out Of Hell
2082530.description:
You are Donovan Ling, a police officer and one of the last living souls in a city decimated by a demonic onslaught! Fight against relentless hordes of the undead, nightmarish horrors and hellish entities as you attempt to unravel the mysteries behind the invasion and escape with your life!

  • Send the demonic dead back to Hell using 20+ tools of destruction! Utilize brutal melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and occult artifacts to cleave and burn your way through the zombie hordes!

  • Explore large and atmospheric levels including an abandoned police station, claustrophobic sewer, haunted forest and more!

  • Immerse yourself in the nightmarish darkness of Hell as you travel back and forth to retrieve powerful occult artifacts!

  • A deep and branching storyline with 3 different endings depending on your decisions!

  • Collect skills during the Singleplayer campaign to use in "Survival Mode", where you must fight through waves of demonic monstrosities!

(This is a remake of the Unreal Tournament 2004 mod of the same name by the same developer.)
2082530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
